column1: #Text=Mako says : " What kind of game are you playing ? "
#Text=You 've got him all in a tizzy and I know you 're only using him to get back at me .
#Text=" Korra says : " I am not , we 're just having fun together .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm looking out for my little brother .
#Text=I do n't want to see his heart get broken .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait a second ... you 're not worried about him , you 're jealous !
#Text=" Mako says : " No , I 'm with Asami .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , but when you 're with her you 're thinking about me , are n't you ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm just being honest .
